name: dtags
summary: Create tag files for Borland Delphi/Kylix
description: This Perl script scans (a given or local) directory tree for Delphi/Kylix files and prints a tag-file to stdout.
install_details:
- install perl
- execute "perl dtags /mysrc/test/ > tags" to create a tagfile from directory "/mysrc/test"
- use ":set tags" to set the location of your tagfiles
